@@ -6,8 +6,8 @@
 kq=0
 for i in range(len(a)):
     if a[i].isnumeric():
         if a[i-1]=='-':
-            kq=kq-a[i]
+            kq=kq-int(a[i])
         else:
-            kq=kq+a[i]
+            kq=kq+int(a[i])
 print(kq)
